name: frins2g
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w1), w0))
